gametools

Class Area

  • java.lang.Object
    • gametools.Area
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Sprite

    public class Area
extends java.lang.Object
    Used for basic positioning and collision.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int CL_INSIDE
      Collision when the first object is completely within the second.
      static int CL_INSIDE_X
      Collision when the first object is completely within the second horizontally, no matter the vertical position.
      static int CL_INSIDE_Y
      Collision when the first object is completely within the second vertically, no matter the horizontal position.
      static int CL_TOUCH
      Collision when the first object has any point within the second.
      static int CL_TOUCH_X
      Collision when the first object has any point within the second horizontally, no matter the vertical position.
      static int CL_TOUCH_Y
      Collision when the first object has any point within the second vertically, no matter the horizontal position.
      static int CR_BOTTOM_LEFT
      Bottom left corner of the object.
      static int CR_BOTTOM_RIGHT
      Bottom right corner of the object.
      static int CR_TOP_LEFT
      Top left corner of the object.
      static int CR_TOP_RIGHT
      Top right corner of the object.
      protected int height
      The height of the object (usually the height of the object's associated image if it exists).
      static Area UNDEFINED_AREA
      An empty area to represent a non existent or undefined object.
      protected int width
      The width of the object (usually the width of the object's associated image if it exists).
      protected double x
      The precise x position of the object.
      protected double y
      The precise y position of the object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Area()
      Creates an area with the coordinates and dimensions of zero.
      Area(Area area)
      Creates an area and copies over the properties from the passed in object.
      Area(java.awt.Dimension size)
      Creates an area with custom dimensions and coordinates of zero.
      Area(Position pos)
      Creates an area on the specified position with dimensions of zero.
      Area(Position pos, java.awt.Dimension size)
      Creates an area at the x and y with the specified dimensions.

      • isWithin

        Checks if a point is within the object.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        True if the specified position is within the object.

      • isWithin

        public boolean isWithin(Area obj)
        Checks if the object is colliding with another object or area using rectangular collision and touch collision as the collision testing method.
        Parameters:
        obj - The object to test collision against.
        Returns:
        True if the objects are in contact.

      • isWithin

        public boolean isWithin(Area obj,
                        int method)
        Checks if the object is colliding with another object or area using rectangular collision and a custom collision flag.
        Parameters:
        obj - The object to test collision against.
        method - The collision testing method to use.
        Returns:
        True if the objects are in contact.
